commit.message:
dumpfile.c (dump_finish): Don't close stderr/stdout.

2013-09-04  Teresa Johnson  <tejohnson@google.com>

	* dumpfile.c (dump_finish): Don't close stderr/stdout.

	* testsuite/gcc.dg/unroll_1.c: Test dumping to stderr.

From-SVN: r202260
